subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Roger Penske cannot say for sure that being fastidious off the racetrack results in being fast on it, but he can say that loyal employees produce results.
snippet: Roger Penske cannot say for sure that being fastidious off the racetrack results in being fast on it, but he can say that loyal employees produce results.
